alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 9:31PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dale and central Coffee Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 931 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elba, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Fort Rucker, Enterprise, Ozark, New Brockton, Lee, Mixons Crossroads, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Turner Crossroads, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Roeton, Marley Hill, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Arcus, Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge and Woodland Grove Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
